name: Heroes of Might and Magic 3 Graphics File
summary: Game data file used by Heroes of Might and Magic III (HOMM3), a turn-based strategy game; stores 2D bitmap images for army units, terrain, buildings, and other objects; used for displaying game graphics and animating sprite graphics.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
